ohuge sewaya laba ganimata apita awasthawak labima ekthara widiyaka wasanawak’ yayi pawasiya.pasugiya juli masaye ragar sangamaye sabhapathiwaraya lesa wada bharagath hitapu ragar kridakayaku wana guwan hamudapathiwaraya me dakwa gathawu kalaya thula merata ragar kridawe unnathiya sandaha dadi kapawimakin yuthuwa katayuthu kala ragar pradhaniyaku lesa kageth prashansawata lakwu ayeki.pasugiya kalayedi aasiyanu sathsamajika ragar shrenigatha kirimwaladi 10 wani sthanaye sita 6 wani sthanaya dakwa ihalata paminimata shri lankawata hakiwima pilibandawa dadi thrupthiyen yuthuwa katha kala ee mahatha idiriyedi aasiyanu shrenigatha kirimwala thawath ihalata yamata shri lanka pilata hakiwanu athayi pawasiya.‘mage madihathwima matha katunayaka guwan hamuda kandawuredi ape ragar kridakayanta siyalu pahasukam walin yuthuwa puhunuwim katayuthu kirime pahasukam api nomile salasala thibenawa’ yayi pawasu gunathilaka mahatha ragar kridawa sandaha anugrahakawarun soya ganime dushkaratha pilibandawada karunu dakwiya.‘anugrahakayan soya ganime gatalu thibenawa.
